p: We chose 10 coffee bushes and 10 shading trees in each shaded-grown coffee system, and measured the following biophysical parameters to model the coffee system on Envi-met software: (i) plant height (h); (ii) basal circumference at 10 cm from ground level (bc10 cm), (iii) canopy height (ch); (iv) basal canopy diameter (bcd), (v) height of first pair of branches (h1bs), and (vi) canopy volume (cv).
